error.server_api_call: An error occurred while calling the server API.

Validation.nickname:min_length: The nickname must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.nickname:max_length: The nickname must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.nickname:regex: Available in nickname: lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers and underscores.
Validation.email:min_length: The email must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.email:max_length: The email must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.email:email_type: The email must comply with the standard (john.smith@example.com).
Validation.password:min_length: The password must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.password:max_length: The password must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.password:regex: The password must contain: a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter and a number.
Validation.title:min_length: The title must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.title:max_length: The title must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.descript:min_length: The description must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.descript:max_length: The description must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.starttime:min_valid_date: The date "{{ minValidDateTime.actualDateTime }}" is less than the minimum value "{{ minValidDateTime.minDateTime }}".
Validation.source:min_length: The source must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.source:max_length: The source must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters.
Validation.tag:min_amount: The number of tags ({{ minAmount.actualAmount }}) is less than the minimum value ({{ minAmount.requiredAmount }}).
Validation.tag:max_amount: The number of tags ({{ maxAmount.actualAmount }}) is greater than the maximum value ({{ maxAmount.requiredAmount }}).
Validation.tag:min_length: The tag must have at least {{ minlength.requiredLength }} characters ({{ minlength.actualValue }}).
Validation.tag:max_length: The tag must have no more {{ maxlength.requiredLength }} characters ({{ maxlength.actualValue }}).
Validation.time:min: The time must be more {{ min.requiredMin }}.
Validation.time:max: The time must be less {{ max.requiredMax }}.

Unauthorized.nickname_or_email_incorrect: The nickname or email address is incorrect.

NotFound.registration_not_found: An record for registering a new user was not found.
NotFound.recovery_not_found: An record to recover the user's password was not found.

NotAcceptable.finish_date_less_start_date: The finish date "{{ invalidPeriod.streamPeriodFinish }}" is less than the start date "{{ invalidPeriod.streamPeriodStart }}".
NotAcceptable.session_not_exist: There is no session for this user.

Conflict.email_already_use: This email is already in use or is being registered.
Conflict.nickname_already_use: This nickname is already in use or is being registered.

ContentTooLarge.finish_date_exceeds_limit: The finish date "{{ periodTooLong.actualPeriodFinish }}" of the search period exceeds the limit "{{ periodTooLong.periodMaxNumberDays }}".
ContentTooLarge.invalid_file_size: File size ({{ invalidFileSize.actualFileSize }}) exceeds max ({{ invalidFileSize.maxFileSize }}).

UnsupportedType.invalid_file_type: File type MIME upload ({{ invalidFileType.actualFileType }}) is not in the list of available ones ({{ invalidFileType.validFileType }}).

RangeNotSatisfiable.parsing_type_not_supported: The data type is not supported during parsing.

InternalServerError.internal_error_accessing_server_api: Internal error when accessing the server API.
InternalServerError.user_not_received_from_request: Authentication - the entity "user" was not received from the request.

Blocking.error_waiting_for_operations: An error occurred while waiting for the operation to complete.
